column5: Thats sort of ironic, when they die they get flushed.
i want one too would match with my shower curtains
But does it play 'OH CANADA'  when you sit down, and if you're a good Canadian, of course, ya gotta stand at attention?
You could multy task just bring your ice fishing gear with you instead a a magazine.It would look more realistic if you added some logs in there.lol sorry could not resist that one.
i wouldnt want anyone staring at me while im in the can
all those beady little eyes looking at you while you are ... in there
Water changes shouldn't be much a hassle.  Pull the lever and presto all clean.  I think the fish deserve better than to see you do your bit all day.
my daughter is potty training and flushing the toilet about 50 times a day . We would need loads of goldfish!
